attributes.action: I voted 'leave' but I have changed my mind.
attributes.additional_details: I had to sign this petition in order to start it. However I voted 'stay'. So one signature must be discounted. Please only sign this if you voted 'leave': let's not give any reason for it to be discredited.
attributes.background: If you voted 'leave' in the Brexit Referendum but have subsequently changed your mind, please sign this petition. Less than 2 million signatures would make it a 52% 'stay' outcome.
